casebody.data:
98-3215 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE ex rel. Henry POSEY v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-3215. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Posey, Henry; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writ; Parish of Orleans Criminal District Court Div. “C” Number 364-975; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98KW-2453

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.3; State ex rel. Melinie v. State, 93-1380 (La.1/12/96), 665 So.2d 1172.

MARCUS, J. not on panel.
